hero.title: Nina Moore
hero.subtitle: Initiatory journeys, healing experiences, and transformative mentorship to awaken your deepest truth and power

pillar1.title: You can already feel it
pillar1.description: That quiet pull inside you, that whisper that you can rise above the loops and limitations.

pillar2.title: You desire to transmute your story
pillar2.description: You are ready to find the gold in the hardship and develop self mastery as you discover your uniqueness.

pillar3.title: You seek remembrance
pillar3.description: Of your power. Of your truth. Of the self you know you are underneath the layers of conditioning.

invitation.title: The Invitation
invitation.p1: Every journey is different — because every soul arrives with its own story, its own wounds, its own readiness.
invitation.p2: There is no script here, only attuned presence and deep listening.
invitation.p3: When you step into this space, you are not coming to "fix yourself."
invitation.p4: You are entering a sacred container for remembering your truth, clearing what no longer serves you, and opening to the self you have not yet dared to fully embody.

transformation.title: Now is the time for full embodied transformation
transformation.subtitle: I am here to walk with you as you build your living temple.
transformation.description: My work is to allow you to bridge your inner awakening and your outer life — helping you integrate your experiences, activate your true self, and embody the purpose you came here to live.
transformation.closing: It's a journey to find the way home to yourself.

transformation.title: Transformation
transformation.description: Healing old patterns, stepping into leadership, transforming relationships, and creating conscious lives and communities.

opening.title: Opening
opening.description: Every session is a portal: an opening, an invitation to become more of who you are and step into your full radiance and purpose.

integration.title: Integration
integration.description: Transform your expression, identify your patterns, learn how to integrate your life experience, transform trauma into wisdom.

cta.title: Cycle of 4 sessions & ongoing support
cta.subtitle: Our 30 minutes connection call will help determine your needs and objectives

items.name: Cecile Gatto
items.text1: Nina has been guiding me with love and gentleness through the key passages of my life for the past four years. Through our sessions, I've gained growing autonomy and serenity in facing both challenges and joys. With an open heart, I've learned to welcome all parts of myself — both shadow and light — and to stay centered amidst life's turbulence.
items.text2: Today, I have a clear vision for my projects, a peaceful and loving relationship with my partner, renewed balance with those around me, and the confidence to make empowered choices.

items.name: Benjamin Barda
items.text1: With grace and incredible intuition, Nina opens wide the doors of consciousness. Through her clairvoyance, deep empathy, and refined listening, barriers within me dissolved, revealing new spaces of courage, joy, and poetry — reconnecting to life's magical sparks, feeling generously supported and inspired no matter the situation.
items.text2: It's about embracing existence in all its dimensions, making decisive choices, finding courage, and becoming the artist of your inner world.

items.name: Will Ashurst
items.text1: I have been working with Nina for the last year, and the clarity, perspective, and wisdom that I have gained through working with her has been profound. She gives me a great feeling that she understands me very well, and she interprets what I say with precision, love, and compassion.
items.text2: Together, we have moved through a lot of topics and areas of my life which I have wanted to shine light on. I plan to continue working with her, as the value and healing that I've gotten from spending time speaking to her has been deeply meaningful.

about.title: About me
bio: I am in service of the collective awakening and the expansion of consciousness.
I value the aliveness of emotions, embodied wisdom, and authentic pathways to freedom.
My field of expertise encompasses a wide array of methods and skills that I have nourished through years of practice and self-inquiry.
As a practitioner and human being, I meet people heart to heart and offer deep presence for growth, healing, and self-realization.
I believe that each individual carries a unique and invaluable gift into the world, waiting to be unraveled.
I am devoted to living in integrity with what wants to be expressed through each of us.

intro.p1: I welcome you to reach out if you feel called to this work. Whether you're seeking guidance through a life transition, integration support after a psychedelic experience, or simply curious to learn more about working together.

form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me what brings you here...

success.title: Thank you for reaching out
success.message: Your message has been received. I'll respond personally within 24-48 hours.
success.confirmation: Check your inbox for a confirmation email

info.languages: Sessions available in English, Spanish, and French

sacredUnion.title: Sacred Union
sacredUnion.subtitle: An ongoing transformation journey for couples ready to deepen their relationship and embark on profound healing and growth together.
description: You've entered the most transformative relationship dynamic of your life and it's kicking your ass. This program is here to hold you through the wild ride, providing anchors to return to when challenges arise.

Together, we'll explore trust, unconditional love, communication, shadow work, and transgenerational trauma healing. This is not traditional couples therapy — this is soul-level work for partners ready to transform.
This is ongoing work that evolves with your relationship. We begin with a 4-week foundation and continue as your journey unfolds, meeting regularly to navigate the depths of sacred partnership.

kundalini.title: Kundalini Transmission
kundalini.subtitle: An ongoing energetic activation sequence for deep life transformation and awakening your inner power.
description: This is not just kundalini activation — this is a sacred transmission of life force energy that moves through your entire being, awakening dormant potential and clearing blockages that have held you back.

Through this work, you'll experience energetic shifts that ripple through every layer of your existence: physical, emotional, mental, and spiritual. This transmission supports your journey of becoming fully embodied in your truth and power.

Each session is uniquely tailored to what your system is ready to receive and integrate. We work with the intelligence of your body and energy field to facilitate profound transformation in a safe, held container.
This is a progressive activation sequence — not a one-time event. We work together over time, building energetic capacity and supporting integration at each stage of your awakening.

retreats.title: Immersive Retreats
retreats.subtitle: Private 1:1 or intimate small group retreats for deep transformational work in a held, sacred container.
description: Sometimes transformation requires stepping away from daily life and immersing yourself fully in the work. These multi-day retreats offer a sacred container for profound healing, activation, and integration.

Whether you come alone for private 1:1 work, or bring your partner or a small group of friends, these retreats are designed to hold you through deep processes that require time, space, and complete presence.

You'll stay over for the duration of the retreat, allowing the work to unfold organically without the interruption of returning to daily responsibilities. This creates the conditions for breakthroughs that simply aren't possible in shorter sessions.
The retreat includes personalized healing sessions, energy work, somatic practices, nature immersion, and sacred ceremony tailored to what wants to emerge for you or your group.

items.title: Private 1:1 Retreats
items.description: Fully personalized multi-day immersions designed around your unique journey, offering deep one-on-one work in a safe, sacred container.

items.title: Couples Retreats
items.description: Intimate retreats for partners seeking to deepen their bond, navigate challenges, and unlock new levels of connection and intimacy.

items.title: Small Group Retreats
items.description: Bring your close friends for a shared transformational journey. Perfect for groups of 2-4 who want to experience healing and growth together.

items.title: Energetic Awakening
items.description: Activation of your life force energy, opening pathways for vitality, creativity, and expanded consciousness to flow freely through your being.

items.title: Deep Clearing
items.description: Release of stuck emotions, limiting beliefs, and energetic blockages that have been held in your body and field, creating space for new possibilities.

items.title: Embodied Transformation
items.description: Integration of higher states of consciousness into your daily life, allowing you to live from a place of authentic power and presence.

weeks.title: Building Trust & Unconditional Love
weeks.description: Setting intentions, exploring trust within yourself and your partner, understanding and practicing unconditional love, and identifying personal barriers to intimacy.

weeks.title: Communication & Shadow Work
weeks.description: Practicing vulnerability, deepening emotional intimacy, identifying and acknowledging your shadows, and learning to embrace the parts of yourself you've hidden.

weeks.title: Healing Transgenerational Trauma
weeks.description: Understanding inherited patterns, de-programming cellular trauma, and fostering inner growth together as you break free from limiting beliefs.

weeks.title: Integration & Celebration
weeks.description: Embracing change together, building resilience, celebrating your progress, and anchoring the transformation into your daily life.

principles.title: Core Principles
items: Trust the process, knowing that there is a world of subtleties beyond the conscious relationship dogma.
You're not healing only yourself. The work ripples far out — you are de-programming transgenerational trauma at a cellular, DNA level.
Welcome the thunderstorms. Use the energy of challenges to bring transformation instead of avoiding them.
You are souls on a mission.

cta.title: Ready to transform your relationship?
cta.subtitle: This program is for couples who trust their soul path and are ready to do the deep work.
